Squizzy::

She nodded and checked the bot in the CR.  She pressed a few buttons 
and the Chamber extracted a few cells off the bot.  She brought the 
sample over to Lady Hawk and set them down on the table in front of 
her. 
"You have a point.  But then again, don't you think the Matrix had 
this planned out long ago? In order to have balance, the matrix 
created both Autobot and Decepticon.  Maximal and Predacon.  This had 
to have happened for a reason. But what that reason is, I am not 
sure."  She went back to corner of the room as started looking at the 
paper work.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Lady Hawk took it for granted that Squizzy would understand. Two 
facts were
> relevant to her. "Predacons fight because they are programmed as 
warriors.
> Maximals fight because Predacons exist." She tried to explain the 
source of
> her beliefs but found it hard to put into words without instegating 
more
> questions. "I'll take you somewhere where I can make it more clear 
to you
> sometime. " she said trying to change the subject. "I have work to 
do, If
> you wish to assist me you can bring me a sample of this new bots 
DNA"
